name: Zup! XS
summary:
Experimental minimal physical puzzle with explosions. The player's must build a level and keep the blue ball on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

▪ 60 Levels
▪ Achievements
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019年4月18日
  • 开发: Quiet River
  • 发行: Quiet River
